items.sentence: I was feeling hungry earlier, but I don\'t feel hungry anymore.
I wish I could do more, but I don\'t know what else I could do.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t have plans for next weekend.
What kind of cheese do you usually eat when you drink red wine?
I wondered whether or not Tom wanted to go to Boston with Mary.
There were so many people in the room that I could barely move.
They say you can usually judge people by the company they keep.
It\'ll be a long time before she gets over her father\'s death.
Don\'t you want to know the truth about what happened that day?
Tom has three sons. All three of them are married to Canadians.
My aunt had been in the hospital for a week when I visited her.
Tom drank a lot last night and is a bit hung over this morning.
Tom ended up not buying the house he was thinking about buying.
Tom and Mary were in the kitchen together all morning, cooking.
I know what today is. It\'s your thirtieth birthday, isn\'t it?
Everyone should choose at least one poem and learn it by heart.
Tom said he didn\'t believe that Mary would do that by herself.
We sang Christmas songs in the car all the way to Tom\'s house.
I\'m sure Tom has already spent a lot of the money we gave him.
I\'ve been a public school teacher for the past thirteen years.
